overview: This is a portrait of a 12-year-old girl who loves ice hockey and has a loving, close-knit family.  Despite rejection by her friends and struggles with suicidal depression, Anneke is determined to be true to herself and maintain a gender fluid identity that matches what she feels on the inside.  Anneke takes us into the heart of a new generation of children who are intuitively questioning the binary gender paradigm.
tagline: What happens when your child changes gender?
title: I'm Just Anneke
